comment_0: Went boggin' the other night and this song came on as we parked.  Makes you want to be a country rock star.  And I live in upstate NY.
comment_1:
Its obviously about drunk driving, Americas pasttime:

..on a dirt road..swerving...An ice cold beer sitting in the console
comment_2: this song is so much better than colt fords song but i kinda like both lol
comment_3: i love this song and this is my lil sister's fav song she love's to sing it and it is so cute
comment_4: This was played at my bros funeral.....R.I.P Christopher lee Jones  1993-2013  love and miss you so much!!!!
comment_5: Colt Ford's version was great, but I LOVE this version. so real. it's as if you're really just chillin' with a beer drivin' down the streets.
comment_6: Great song, I like the "King in the can and the Marlboro Man Jack and Jim were a few good men" line a lot, reminds me of my friends, we always drink cans of Budweiser (king of beers) and smoke a few Reds. We are partial to Jack Daniels but Jim Beam will do. Just a good song makes me never want to grow up.
comment_7: no offense but the colt ford version is way better then this one.
comment_8: This is mine and my step-dad's song! When we hear it we cant help be sing along!!!
comment_9: A guy is just reminiscing about the simple days of his youth. He grew up in the country, obviously, and loves the way those folks live.
comment_10: This Was Originally Colt Ford's Song.. :)
